anim_blocks.anim_code: addLayer({start_beat}s, 5s, {{ addLayer(0s, 2.5s, {{ addDrawing(0s, 2.5s, animLoadingBar(5s, {color_0}, #000000)); addDrawing(0s, 2.5s, animLoadingBar(-5s, #000000, {color_0})); }}); addLayer(0s, 5s, {{ addDrawing(0s, 5s, animFill(Infinity, {color_0})); filDrawing(0s, 5s, animLoadingBar(-5s, #000000, {color_0})); filDrawing(0s, 5s, animLoadingBar(5s, {color_0}, #000000)); }}); }}).modifyTimeChange(1s, {time_modifer}s);
